params.adjustment: details about adjustment, containing account, subId, amount
params.caller: the msg.sender that initiate the transfer. might not be the owner
params.manager: the manager contract that will verify the end state. Should verify if this is a trusted manager
params.tradeId: unique number attached to a batched transfers.                It is possible that this hook will receive multiple calls with different tradeIds within 1 transaction.

returns.finalBalance: the final balance to be recorded in the account
returns.needAllowance: if this adjustment should require allowance from non-ERC721 approved initiator

handleAdjustment((uint256,address,uint25.notice: triggered when an adjustment is triggered on the asset balance
